Class: Rotate

ImagerJs.plugins.Rotate(imagerInstance, options)

new Rotate(imagerInstance, options)

Rotate plugins. Allows image rotation.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
imagerInstance
options Object Rotating controls options.
Properties
Name Type Description
controlsCss Object Css properties that will be applied to rotating controls.
controlsTouchCss Object Css properties that will be applied to rotating controls when on touch device.
Source:
  • plugins/rotate/Rotate.js, line 21

Methods

reset()

Reset all rotation related variables, so on the next rotation start it will start from zeroed rotation.

  • plugins/rotate/Rotate.js, line 373
